oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Maps from "al-Qāhirah"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Zakī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān, author.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Maps show Cairo at various points in history as well as its development over time.
